text:
Joseph Nyumah Boakai, Sr. (born 30 November 1944) is a Liberian politician. He has been Vice President of Liberia since January 2006, serving under President Ellen Johnson Sirleaf.
in 2016, Boakai announced his intention to run for the Liberian presidency in the 2017 general election. He is viewed by many as a safe and uncorrupt candidate. He faced Senator and football star George Weah in the second round, but lost the round to Weah.
